name: The Bomb goes Kaboom!
description:
This game was made in ONE hour for the weekly Trijam game jam. I never had time to do the rest of my 3 hours, however it is playable so I decided to release it.

------------------------------------------------------------

You are a young man, and right next to you there is a big bomb that will go kaboom very soon. So you have to go around and collect more fuse to lengthen the time you have left
